Package teamlab

Class PlayerInfo

  • java.lang.Object
    • teamlab.PlayerInfo
  • public class PlayerInfo
extends java.lang.Object
    Author:
    Yiwen
    PlayerInfo class stores player information including name and score for score display at the end of the game.
